name: Piratas (vitassos) (vitassos)
description:
Piratas

This is Piratas, a top-down pirate themed arcade shooter. Have fun destroying the pirates and watch out for the ghost ship!

A-W-D or left-up-right arrows: move;

left mouse button or Z: primary fire;

left mouse button or X: secondary fire;

Esc or P to pause.

Thanks for playing!

License information can be found in the "Credits" file.
